actions.label: holding steering wheel
actions.details: A person's gloved hands are holding the steering wheel of a car while driving.

actions.label: left hand shifts gear
actions.details: The person's left hand moves to and manipulates the gear stick.

actions.label: right hand opens car door
actions.details: The person's right hand reaches for and pulls the car door handle, opening the door.

actions.label: manipulating gear stick
actions.details: Left hand manipulates the gear stick

actions.label: gripping steering wheel
actions.details: Both hands grip the steering wheel

actions.label: turning steering wheel
actions.details: Both hands turn the steering wheel
